description1: How many api calls can be made per minute by random ips before the ip is limited or banned
description2: How many api calls can be made per minute by other validator nodes before the ip is limited or banned
description3: These 2 variables are only used in validator nodes and not rpc nodes
description4: How many tcp connections can be made per minute by random ips before the ip is limited or banned
description5: How many tcp connections can be made per minute by other validators before the ip is limited or banned
description6: These 2 variables are only used in validator nodes and not rpc nodes
description7: How many udp connections can be made per minute by random ips before the ip is limited or banned
description8: How many udp connections can be made per minute by other validator nodes before the ip is limited or banned
description: These 2 variables are only used in validator nodes and not rpc nodes
description9: The interval in milliseconds that this node will wait before checking for new blocks
note: To properly detect if this node is synced in the Synchronizer class, it is advised to set this value to less than the block time
description10: The timeout in milliseconds that this node will wait before giving up on a block fetch
description13: The number of blocks to request per synchronization request
description14: The max number of blocks to share per synchronization request from others
description11: If true, this node will synchronize with the validators, if false, it will synchronize with only the provided nodes
description12: The list of validator or rpc nodes that this node fetches blocks from
